content.title: Odisha State Treatment Fund
content.details: The Odisha State Treatment Fund (OSTF) provides financial assistance for treatment in government medical colleges and hospitals, as well as district hospitals and capital hospitals in Odisha.
benefits: Financial assistance up to Rs. 2.00 lakh
eligibility: Patients admitted to government medical colleges and hospitals
Patients requiring treatment assistance as per the guidelines
content.application_process: Patients must submit an application in the prescribed format with necessary documents to the Nodal Officer of the concerned department.
